engine.util.factory

Class TextureFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.util.factory.TextureFactory

  • public class TextureFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory for creating Textures.
    Author:
    Benny Bobaganoosh (thebennybox@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextureFactory

        public TextureFactory(IRenderDevice device,
              java.lang.String filePath)
        Creates a new Texture Factory.
        Parameters:
        device - The device to load textures for.
        filePath - The base path for image files.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public Texture get(java.lang.String fileName,
          int filter)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Gets a new object from the factory. If the desired object already exists, then that object is returned. Otherwise, a new object is created.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of an image file to be loaded.
        filter - The type of filtering to be used. Should be one of the IRenderDevice.FILTER options. Note that this is only updated if the desired texture hasn't been loaded yet.
        Returns:
        A Texture matching the specification.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the file cannot be loaded.
